section.title: Description
section.p: Describes about the installation of additional libraries required for BUSMASTER compilation.

section.title: Support to IXXAT hardware
section.p: The following steps should be followed to compile CAN_IXXAT_VCI project in BUSMASTER.

ul.li: Download and install IXXAT VCI drivers from the following link
Set Windows environment variable 'IXXAT_VCI_SDK' with the path to the VCI header files (e.g. IXXAT_VCI_SDK = "C:\Program Files\IXXAT\VCI 3.5\sdk\Microsoft_VisualC").
Restart the machine after performing the above two steps

section.title: Libxml2 linking support
section.p: The following steps should be followed to compile BUSMASTER.

ul.li: Download and Copy libxml2-2.7.8.win32, iconv-1.9.2.win32 and zlib-1.2.5.win32 from the following link to C: drive
